Items.description: Adjusted the text for the spell Life Draw (Death B) and duration for the technique Confusing Blow (Strength)
Items.title: Bugfix: Minimal textual adjustments

Items.description: When switching language, the page may sometimes not translate all values correctly, due to a local browser cache. This change enforces refreshing and reloading of resources.
Items.title: Bugfix: Partial translation due to caching

Items.description: The entire page and source files dynamically change language. All source files have been translated.
Items.title: Feature: Added English Translation

Items.description: With the latest update, some names and references have been changed. Skills, spells, recipes, and associated texts/page numbers have been reviewed and adjusted where necessary.
Items.title: Rules: Content and URL references updated to the rulebooklets.

Items.description: The method of fetching data from source files has been made more defensive and simultaneously adjusted to support multiple languages in the future.
Items.title: Technology: Various background adjustments in source file references.

Items.description: Exporting a character to a file could result in a file without a version number. This could result in an unusable file.
Items.title: BugFix: Export of character to file

Items.description: Previously, the requirements for skills were not always displayed correctly. These have been improved and supplemented with category requirements.
Items.title: Looks & Feels: Requirements display for skills improved in PDF export.

Items.description: The use of 'Pound of Elemental Flesh' material has been added to all crafting skills.
Items.title: Maintenance: Pound of Elemental Flesh added as component to Recipes

Items.description: The description of several templates has been adjusted for clarification.
Items.title: Looks & Feels: Various textual adjustments in template descriptions.

Items.description: The description of a template was divided into two fields, causing the text to display incorrectly. This has been changed to one field.
Items.title: Looks & Feels: Template description field size.

Items.description: When the 'new character' checkbox is checked, it is no longer possible to select 'Mentor Expertise' from the selection list.
Items.title: Looks & Feels: Mentor Expertise no longer available for new characters.

Items.description: Character properties have been split between Character Properties and Energy per Day for clarification.
Items.title: Looks & Feels: Splitting properties and Energy per Day.

Items.description: To improve field changes on mobile devices, the minimum value for the Max XP field has been adjusted from 1 > 0.
Items.title: BugFix: Minimum MaxXP value lowered to 0.

Items.description: Panels can now be closed by clicking outside the window, in addition to the close button (X).
Items.title: Looks & Feels: Updated panel closing.

Items.description: Descriptions of several imbue-enhancing value components have been adjusted for clarification.
Items.title: Looks & Feels: Clarification of certain crafting components.

Items.description: Switching between new/existing and back to new could result in negative total XP. Adding a skill would result in an error message.
Items.title: BugFix: Adding skill with negative total XP.

Items.description: When a new item is added to the table, the chosen sorting remains intact.
Items.title: BugFix: Sorting in table preserved.

Items.description: There was a missing import for a font, which could result in an error when exporting a PDF document.
Items.title: BugFix: Console Error missing font type.

Items.description: Correction on inspiration gained from the skill Knowledge of Herbs. 3 > 2 inspiration.
Items.title: BugFix: Knowledge of Herbs Correction.

Items.description: Correction on maximum XP that can be stored when creating a new character. 2 > 3 XP.
Items.title: BugFix: Correction on maximum XP to be stored for new character.

Items.description: Correction on panel size causing items to not display correctly in some cases.
Items.title: Looks & Feels: Correction panel size Spells, Techniques & Recipes.

Items.description: Correction on tooltip when displaying a spell, technique, or recipe. The term mana has been replaced by the overarching, correct term: energy.
Items.title: BugFix: Correction on tooltip for Spells, Techniques & Recipes.

Items.description: Each template has received a description of the archetype character and any advice for playing this type at VA.
Items.title: Feature: Templates include additional description.

Items.description: In addition to the restriction that a maximum of 2 XP can be stored for a new character, new players can now make changes via the info desk during or after the first event.
Items.title: Looks/Feels: Addition to minimum XP

Items.description: Export to PDF includes an image of character properties. This image was sometimes distorted due to different dimensions.
Items.title: Bugfix: Export to PDF may contain distorted images.

Items.description: To better maintain source files, multiple validations have been added to ensure consistent maintenance.
Items.title: Maintenance: Addition of validations on source files

Items.description: Clicking on the version displays the release information. Release information is automatically shown upon an update when the 'automatically show release information' checkbox is checked.
Items.title: Feature: Release information visible to users

Items.description: When the checkbox is unchecked, the input remains. Only when enabled, everything is cleared when one or more extra skills are present.
Items.title: Looks/Feels: Checkbox 'New character' toggle doesn't always clear the grid.

Items.description: When the new character checkbox is checked, no more than 2 XP may remain. This is indicated by red text and an info button.
Items.title: Looks/Feels: Starting character may not keep more than 2 XP

Items.description: Export to PDF includes an image of character properties. This image was improperly scaled when exported from a mobile device.
Items.title: Bugfix: Export to PDF image does not scale correctly when exported from a mobile device

Items.description: When selecting the Paladin preset, it was not loaded due to a layout error.
Items.title: Bugfix: Paladin preset did not load.

Items.description: When loading a character, the Basic and Extra selection fields were not cleared. This allowed skills to be entered twice, leading to errors.
Items.title: Bugfix: Loading a character potentially led to duplicate skills

Items.description: To improve maintainability and enhance component quality, certain notification functionalities have been decentralized.
Items.title: Maintenance: General improvements and maintenance.

Items.description: When saving/exporting a character, all data from skills was exported, causing updated skills to not be visible and old issues to persist. Method of saving/exporting has been adjusted; existing saves/exports are converted upon loading.
Items.title: Feature: Adjustment to save/export of a character.

Items.description: When a character name is entered, it is saved. Both in exports and temporary browser storage, it is remembered.
Items.title: Feature: Entered character name is remembered.

Items.description: When a character is prepared (created or loaded), it can be downloaded as a PDF export.
Items.title: Feature: Exporting character to a PDF file

Items.description: A regression test revealed a specific situation where it was possible to exceed the max XP limit when adding skills.
Items.title: Bugfix: Exceeded max XP in specific situation.
